section_images.usage: Full-width lifestyle banner for 'Why Women Love It' section
Detail shot banner for rhinestone quality section
Casual lifestyle banner for versatility section

faq_image.reason: Clean studio shot showing full product detail, professional, answers 'what does it look like' visually

guarantee_image.reason: Confident front-facing pose, clean professional look, conveys quality and trust

items.relevance: Perfect pairing - needed for backless dress
Completes the look - no visible lines

recommended_bundle.reasoning: Nipple covers + underwear = complete foundation. Earrings are nice-to-have but not essential.

diversity_analysis.notes: Good ethnic diversity in testimonials. Strong variety of real-world settings. Product shots all same model (expected). Testimonials show dress in multiple contexts.

notes_for_implementation.hero_gallery_strategy: Mix of professional studio shots (product-XX.jpg) with authentic lifestyle UGC (testimonial_XX.png) for credibility. Lead with high-impact nightlife shot (product-01.jpg) that screams 'going out dress'.
notes_for_implementation.overlay_content_matching: Overlays paired with image context - nightlife images get 'stays in place all night' questions, bookstore gets 'casual wear' questions, formal settings get 'event appropriate' questions.
notes_for_implementation.comparison_approach: Indoor formal (grayscale) vs outdoor confidence (color) - NOT showing body change, showing LIFESTYLE upgrade and versatility of same dress.
notes_for_implementation.testimonial_authenticity: All testimonial images show real people in real settings - hotel mirror selfies, bookstore visits, outdoor events. This builds trust better than studio shots alone.
notes_for_implementation.order_bump_logic: Nipple covers are ESSENTIAL for backless dress (100% relevant). Seamless underwear prevents lines (highly relevant). Earrings complement but not essential (nice-to-have).
notes_for_implementation.tiktok_compliance_critical: Comparison slider shows CONTEXT change (setting/lighting/mood) NOT body change. Same dress on similar body types in different environments. Safe for TikTok ads.
notes_for_implementation.diversity_representation: Strong ethnic diversity (Asian, Black, White, Mixed). Multiple real-world settings (bookstores, restaurants, streets, events). Shows product works for different occasions and people.
notes_for_implementation.color_psychology: Navy + gold = luxury + confidence. Product shots show rhinestone sparkle detail. Lifestyle shots show how it catches light in different settings.
